Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1986...
Injured on 6/26/1987 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/23/1988 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/7/1988, off Larry Christenson (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/9/1988, off Lee Guetterman (CHC)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against St. Louis on 5/23/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1990, hitting .400 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Philadelphia, driving in 4 runs on 4/1/1992...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Traded from Los Angeles to New York (N) on 1/31/1993 (Going to LA: CF B. Giles, RF S. Green, C G. Williams. Going to NYM: LF G. Sheffield, 2B R. Gant, RF T. Benzinger, P J. Jones)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1993, hitting .483 with 2 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1993, hitting .478 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1993, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1993, hitting .393 with 5 HR, 33 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/16/1994 to a 2-year deal worth $25,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1994, hitting .458 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 5/9/1994...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1994, hitting .385 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/6/1994, hitting .455 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Baltimore on 1/31/1995 (Going to CHC: RF M. Ordonez, 1B B. Fullmer, P D. Lowe, CF D. Roberts. Going to BAL: P D. Wells, RF G. Sheffield, CF J. Gonzalez, 3B H. Matsunaga).
..
Was selected to the 1995 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1996, hitting .538 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 1996 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1997, hitting .444 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
